mods.abstract: The California Magazine of Western Square and Round Dancing by the Square Dancers of Southern California. This edition includes a table of contents which lists the following: "A Look At 1983", "What Are They Dancing?", "Pre-Teen Dancers", "The Big Events of 1983", "Quarterly Movement Report - Mainstream", "Why Single Clubs?", and "National Convention." This edition also includes the regular features entitled "From the Floor" (letters to the editor), "As I See It", "Contra Corner", "Mostly Modular", "Advanced Dancing", "Experimental Notes", "Take A Good Look", "The Dancers Walkthru", "Traditional Treasury", "Roundancer Module", "Paging the Round Dancers", "The Callers Notebook", "Ladies on the Square", "Style Lab", "Round the World of Square Dancing", "Workshop", "Caller of the Month", "On The Record" and "Current Releases."
mods.accessCondition: Copyright restrictions may apply. User is responsible for all copyright compliance.
